resources: Snoozeloo Your Alarms It\'s empty! Add the first alarm so you don\'t miss an important moment! Alarm in %1$dd %2$dh %3$dmin Alarm in %1$dh %2$dmin Alarm in %1$dmin Save Alarm Name Turn Off Overlay Permission To show alarms on top of other apps, please grant the overlay permission. Grant Permission Cancel Permission required Okay In order to display the alarm as a notification, this app needs your permission for that. Please click on \"Okay\" to grant it. Mo Tu We Th Fr Sa Su Go to bed at %1$s to get 8h of sleep Repeat Alarm ringtone Silent"
